metadata.title: Arctic Data: current meter data
metadata.description: Continuous, year-round Aanderaa current meter observations for stations in the Beaufort Sea, Archipelago, Baffin Bay, and elsewhere in the arctic to 2000. In some areas current meters have been replaced (in the 1990`s) by acoustic Doppler current profiler data .
keywords: Beaufort Sea, Arctic Archipelago, Baffin Bay
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Supports scientific and environmental research.

Supplemental Information: Custom software is available for use with this dataset.

Status: In Work

Maintenance frequency: Continually

Access constraints: Departmental

Use constraints: None
